    • Method Detail

      • convertValueToString

        protected java.lang.String convertValueToString(de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?> rDataElement,
                                                java.lang.Object rValue)
        Description copied from class: DataElementUI
        Returns a string representation of a value that is related to a certain data element. Related means that it is either the data element value itself or of the element's validator. This method can be overridden by subclasses to modify the standard display of data elements. It will be invoked by the default implementations of the component creation methods.

        The default implementation returns the toString() result for the value or an empty string if the value is NULL.

        Overrides:
        convertValueToString in class DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DateDataElement>
        Parameters:
        rDataElement - The data element to convert the value for
        rValue - The value to convert
        Returns:
        The element display string
        See Also:
        DataElementUI.convertValueToString(DataElement, Object)

      • createInputUI

        protected de.esoco.ewt.component.Component createInputUI(de.esoco.ewt.build.ContainerBuilder<?> rBuilder,
                                                         de.esoco.ewt.style.StyleData rInputStyle,
                                                         de.esoco.data.element.DateDataElement rDataElement)
        Must be overridden by subclasses to modify the creation of the user interface components for the editing of the data element's value. The default implementation creates either a TextField with the value returned by DataElementUI.convertValueToString(DataElement, Object) or a list if the data element's value is constrained by a ListValidator. The list values will be read from the validator, converted with the above method, and finally expanded as resources. The creation of these components is handled by #createEditComponent(ContainerBuilder, StyleData, DataElement).
        Overrides:
        createInputUI in class DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DateDataElement>
        Parameters:
        rBuilder - The container builder to create the components with
        rInputStyle - The default style data for the input components
        rDataElement - The data element to create the UI for
        Returns:
        The input user interface component or NULL if it shall not be handled by this instance

      • createInteractionHandler

        Creates the interaction handler for this instances. Subclasses may override this method to return their own type of interaction handler.
        Overrides:
        createInteractionHandler in class DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DateDataElement>
        Returns:
        The data element interaction handler

      • transferDataElementValueToComponent

        protected void transferDataElementValueToComponent(de.esoco.data.element.DateDataElement rElement,
                                                   de.esoco.ewt.component.Component rComponent)
        Transfers the value of a data element into a component. Must be overridden by subclasses that use special components to render data elements. This default implementation handles the standard components that are created by this base class.

        This method will be invoked from the DataElementUI.updateValue() method if the UI needs to be updated from the model data (i.e. from the data element).

        Overrides:
        transferDataElementValueToComponent in class DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DateDataElement>
        Parameters:
        rElement - The data element to transfer the value of
        rComponent - The component to set the value of

      • transferInputToDataElement

        protected void transferInputToDataElement(de.esoco.ewt.component.Component rComponent,
                                          de.esoco.data.element.DateDataElement rElement)
        Must be overridden by subclasses to modify the default transfer of input values from the user interface components to the data element. This method will only be invoked if this instance is in input mode and the data element is not immutable.

        The default implementation expects either a text field or a list as created by DataElementUI.createInputUI(ContainerBuilder, StyleData, DataElement). In the first case it invokes the DataElement.setStringValue(String) method with the field value. For a list the selected value will be read from the element's list validator.

        Overrides:
        transferInputToDataElement in class DataElementUI<de.esoco.data.element.DateDataElement>
        Parameters:
        rComponent - The component to read the input from
        rElement - The data element to set the value of
